facebook/react-native.summary: Recent activities in the facebook/react-native repository involve a pull request to optimize the roundLayoutResultsToPixelGrid function by avoiding redundant fmod calls, which was found to be expensive during UI performance profiling and resulted in a ~1% layout operation efficiency improvement.

facebook/litho.summary: The facebook/litho repository has seen recent activity with a pull request aimed at improving performance by eliminating duplicate fmod function calls in the roundLayoutResultsToPixelGrid function, leading to a reduction in instructions from ~50 to ~30 and a ~1% increase in efficiency for a specific benchmark.

facebook/yoga.summary: The facebook/yoga repository has undergone a recent optimization through a pull request that replaces duplicate fmod calls with a single round operation in the roundLayoutResultsToPixelGrid function, which enhances performance by reducing the number of instructions and resulting in a ~1% increase in efficiency for a particular benchmark.
